name: Ugh. Moon took my hat!!
description:
A game I made featuring way too much cursing and almost no gameplay!! 😅
Created in 24h using Unity and Gimp for the BBQ JAM 2018 in Luxembourg (The theme was "Solar").

Please play with sound on!

Credits for songs and SFXs:

  • Sunday Morning — Nicolai Heidlas Music (CC BY 3.0)
  • Ice Flow — Kevin MacLeod (CC BY 3.0) 
  • Run — Ethan Meixsell
  • In Your Arms  — Nicolai Heidlas Music (CC BY 3.0)
  • Sound effects:
    • https://freesound.org/people/Fr3yr/sounds/100804/
    • https://freesound.org/people/aleksnascimento/sounds/161195/
    • https://opengameart.org/content/dialog-vocal-samples
